Job Title: Test Engineer, Mid with Security Clearance

Location: East Aurora, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job Number: R0192501 Test Engineer, Mid

Key Role: Support the QA team with testing a Web-based application. Write test cases and update existing ones. Leverage experience with Azure DevOps. Test APIs and create and run selenium test scripts. Leverage expertise of the Agile process. Basic Qualifications: * 4+ years of experience with functional testing * 2+ years of experience with automated test tools to test Web-based applications, working with the Agile team * 2+ years of experience with functional testing, regression testing, performance testing, and system integration testing, supporting user acceptance testing * Experience with using test automation tools, including Selenium and Agile development methodologies, such as Scrum * Ability to troubleshoot and debug system issues, business processes, and Agile approaches * Secret c

other.content: Test Engineer, Mid with Security Clearance

Job Number: R0192501 Test Engineer, Mid

Key Role: Support the QA team with testing a Web-based application. Write test cases and update existing ones. Leverage experience with Azure DevOps. Test APIs and create and run selenium test scripts. Leverage expertise of the Agile process.

Basic Qualifications:
* 4+ years of experience with functional testing
* 2+ years of experience with automated test tools to test Web-based applications, working with the Agile team
* 2+ years of experience with functional testing, regression testing, performance testing, and system integration testing, supporting user acceptance testing
* Experience with using test automation tools, including Selenium and Agile development methodologies, such as Scrum
* Ability to troubleshoot and debug system issues, business processes, and Agile approaches
* Secret clearance
